It’s been around the same, but if I had to say either way… It’s been a little better actually. 
Below was yesterday‘s battery on my iPhone 16 Pro. 

8 hrs & 16 mins of SOT/Active with 14% battery remaining. 
Took off charge at 100% at 6:29 AM ; and as you can see that
I’ve been one 1% for two straight days
Haven't noticed a big change yet.
In my experience, it’s gotten a bit better.
Wooooorrrsstttttt 18.3.2 was top of the top maximum 75% used per day, now 125%
it wasn't until the most recent Beta release. Seems to be OK now

I haven't really checked, which I guess means I haven't noticed.

So I am going to go with normal...
When I disabled Apple Intelligence it has become slightly better to be fair
